PrecisAppointment of ROBERT M. GREGAN, of the City of Amherst, in the Province of Nova Scotia, to be a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia (Family Division), and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal, effective June 19, 2015.
